meanings.sent1: The robot had a programmable system that allowed it to follow specific commands.
meanings.sent2: The programmable thermostat was set to turn on the heater at a certain temperature.
meanings.sent3: The programmable coffee maker decided to start brewing coffee at midnight as a prank.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a programmable machine, able to process information quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The programmable toy car zoomed around the room, following the path it was given.

meanings.definition: Able to be set to perform a specific task or function.
meanings.sent1: The programmable alarm clock woke him up at the same time every morning.
meanings.sent2: She used a programmable remote control to operate all her electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: The programmable sprinkler system decided to water the garden during a rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: His voice was like a programmable instrument, able to hit any note with precision.
meanings.sent5: The programmable drone flew autonomously, following the route it was programmed to take.
